content:
I will take the action to open a tracker item for the need to document how to validate QuestionnnaireResponses in the IG validator when there is a launchContext, answerExpression or enableWhenExpression (unless Lloyd opened one already).

Do we also need a tracker item for adding Brian's spreadsheet https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179255-questionnaire/topic/Questionnaire.20property.20cross.20reference to SDC IG?

FHIR-36338 Documentation needed for how to validate Questionnaire Responses in IG with some SDC expressions

FHIR-36339 Questionnaire Property Cross Reference matrix
